sentences: Born in Littleton, Colorado, Andrew Borger went to UC Berkeley and played extensively in the San Francisco Bay Area club scene before being recognized by Tom Waits and later Norah Jones.
Andrew (who also goes by Andy) has numerous recordings, and is featured in the DVD Norah Jones & the Handsome Band: Live in 2004.
He currently lives in Portland, OR, and performs and tours with Meow Meow and Pink Martini.
